title: Trump Lies About His Cruel Family Separation Policy: A Closer Look | Louie Anderson
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump attacking the Russia investigation while lying about his administration's cruel policy of separating families at the border.

Then, Louie Anderson explains how he came up with name of his Big Underwear tour, reveals he's an underwear hoarder and talks about his book Hey Mom.

After that, Louie talks to Late Night producer Kevin Miller backstage at Studio 8G.
